how.title: Aranet Cloud API is easy and convenient
how.text:
Access all Aranet cloud data via pull-type integration
No 3rd party data storage necessary - all data available in Aranet Cloud
Full data history and backup available on a secure server
Access all cloud specific data - virtual sensors, alarms, assets
API key authorization, JSON data format

how.title: Join Aranet software Alliance Program
how.subtitle: Using our Cloud API makes your business smarter, joining our Software Alliance even more so, here is why
how.text:
Access to all sensor data in your platform
Active promo of your software through our sales channels and industry events
Commission for Aranet sensor sales
Marketing of your software on our social media channels

how.title: Aranet Software partners
how.subtitle: See how our partners from horticulture, IAQ & HVAC, livestock, and retail industries benefit from the Cloud API integration. If you are a software developer looking for the best IoT sensors, we are here for you.

headline.title: Aranet Cloud API integration for developers
headline.excerpt: Access our wireless sensors and measured data seamlessly - use our API and build new software solutions for your customers or brand new software business on top of our ecosystem.

cta.title: API terms of Use
cta.desc: We like people too. Whether you run a school or grow tomatoes, we want to help you achieve more. Tell us about your business and let’s see how we can help.

solutions.title: Horticulture
solutions.text: Maximize yield of modern greenhouse by monitoring and adjusting climate conditions.

solutions.title: IAQ & HVAC
solutions.text: Minimize energy costs, improve indoor air quality, and provide useful data for building management system.

solutions.title: Livestock
solutions.text: ensure the best living conditions for animals and maximize the quality of the final product.

solutions.title: Retail
solutions.text: comply with HACCP regulations, optimize energy usage, prevent food spoilage, and maintain a healthy space for customers.

why.title: Secure data retrieval
why.text: A safe and reliable way to get current and historical data from the Aranet ecosystem through the internet.

why.title: Remote management
why.text: Configure and manage base stations and sensors in an online interface regardless of your physical location.

why.title: Scalability
why.text: Effortless connection of unlimited amount of base stations and sensors after one-time integration.

why.title: Long-term savings
why.text: High repeatability of base station installation and troubleshooting remotely saves resources and labour cost.

start.title: Start Cloud API integration today
start.text: Check out our demo that provides direct experience of all the Aranet sensor system possibilities before diving in fully. Explore available sensors, latest measurements, long term history, or specified period data.
